Message.Msg: I would apreciate a link to what Warren said on this. I am fully aware that he wants to see the rich pay much more. However, I have never seen or heard him say cap. gain at 30% and 50% for the top rate. A link would be appreciated.

Message.Msg: I found your post easy enough.

No one eats Twinkies (or any other Hostess products) anymore. They are unhealthy and kind of gross. Niche and grocery bakeries are largely filling the space for baked desserts. I'm sure you'll blame Obama this and Obama that, but businesses that produce the exact same products for decades and decades on end fail. "the EPA puts the farmers out of business." Message.Title: AT&T exclusive on new Nokia phone
Message.Msg: Nokia is counting heavily on its new Lumia smartphone line, powered by Microsoft Corp.'s (MSFT) latest Windows software for smartphones, to regain lost ground. In the U.S., AT&T sells Nokia's Lumia 920 for $99.99 on a two-year contract, undercutting rival smartphones such as Apple Inc.'s (AAPL) new iPhone 5 and Samsung Electronics Co.'s (005930.SE) Galaxy SIII. T is up 66 cents today but has double topped at $33.85 and will probably pull back a little the rest of the day. JMHO

"would not HATE another White person simply for valid beliefs and concerns about the status of the White race and its genocide." You're right. They would hate a person, any person, with your beliefs--race notwithstanding. It is your beliefs, not your race, that makes you contemptible. They are not valid beliefs. The status of white people is clearly not a cause for concern. And as for this zany genocide you keep claiming, I hold up your continued free existence as well as mine, and the wealth, influence and freedom of just about every white person I know. You are delusional, which I suppose may make you an object of pity. But the nature of your delusions certainly holds you out as an object of contempt as well. If you are too much of a coward to speak with the people around you, well, I guess that says it all. Stay alone in your basement and stay silent in your Captain D's. It gives me immense pleasure to know that is what those with your beliefs are reduced to.
